price: ߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߤߍ߲߬ ߊߟߎ߬ ߡߐ߱ ߟߎ߬ ߸ ߒߠߋ ߦߴߊߟߎ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߖߊ߬ߛߙߋ߬ߡߊ߬ߟߌ߬ߟߊ߬ ߘߐ߬ߜߍ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߘߋ߬
arabic: قُلۡ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qul yāayyuhā al-nāsu innamā anā lakum nadhīrun mubīnun
